title: The Orphan lions
creator_credit: Jack Couffer, Carl Foreman, Columbia Pictures and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: An edited version of the feature film “Living free” in which three lion cubs in danger of not surviving after the death of their mother are taken on a journey of 700 miles by two conservationists and set free on the Serengeti Plains in Africa.
creator_credit_for_label: Jack Couffer, Carl Foreman, Columbia Pictures and Learning Corporation of America
